channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipping in alley., 29th September
item.description:
These are the worst example between Pymmes Road and Eleanor Road but there is plenty of other rubbish which needs to be cleared.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wishaw Walk, Palmers Green, London

item.title: Overflowing bins and general state of the street in front of 2A, 29th September
item.description:
This part of the street is just unacceptable. There are overflowing private bins, and two bikes parked here since years with the front basket full of rubbish. Looks terrible.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Beatty Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Excessive fallen crab apples on road pavement and driveway., 29th September
item.description:
Excessive fallen apples outside 148/150/152 Sutherland avenue and on driveway. This has been an issue for years. Whilst not adverse to a tree being there. Could one that doesn't cause such a mess replace it. And the current debris be cleared please
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sutherland Avenue, Falconwood, London
